item.description:
Masacote's Beantown SALSA JAM!
This Saturday, August 9th!

FEEL THE HEAT!
DISCLAIMER: This is NOT for the weak at heart! Get ready to WORK UP A SWEAT!

------------------
But first, join us during the day at the 3 hour Afro Cuban Bootcamp with Out of Town Guest Dancer Gordon Neil!
http://www.masacoteen...

AND! Join us at 8 for the Free Beginner Hour Lesson or 8:30 for Gordon's Free 30 min Footwork Challenge!
-------------------

Come dance with us August 9th! 8pm-12am!

8pm FREE Beginner Lesson!
8:30-9pm FREE SPECIAL 30 min Footwork Challenge with visiting Dancer Extraordinaire Gordon Neil!
9pm Dancing Begins!

Come for the lesson, Stay for the dancing!

----------------------------------------------
Watch Videos of our May Salsa Social!
http://youtube.com/wa...
http://youtube.com/wa...
----------------------------------------------

HEAT UP the dance floor with us this August!
For the Salsaholics who just can't get enough!
For those who are looking for some GREAT, IRRESISTIBLE music...
And For those who JUST WANT TO DANCE!
Great Venue, Great Music, Great People, and EVEN BETTER DANCERS!

-----------------------
With DJ Rob Suave Spinning the Hottest Salsa to keep you ON YOUR FEET!
www.djrobsuave.com

-----------------------

Can you feel the heat?!

Party for ONLY $8!
Student Discount: $5 with student ID ALL NIGHT

Location: Knights of Columbus; 75 West School St; Charlestown, MA

T Accessible!
Cash Bar...Plenty of FREE Parking...Warm, Family Vibe! All Ages Welcome!

You DON'T Want to Miss This Party!
We'll see you there!!!!!!!!

More info:
http://www.masacoteen...
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Sheila & Jason teaching the beginner class!

group.name: The Boston & Cambridge Salsa Meetup Group

item.name: Masacote's Beantown SALSA JAM! This Saturday, August 9th!
